nodes.text: The EV2 discreet reconnaissance macrobinoculars was a Macrobinoculars designed and produced by the legendary spymaster known as The Shroud. Named after one of his top lieutenants Evie Bo, the EV2 model possessed top-notch features such as supreme-resolution zoom, wide-spectrum environmental analysis, full voice/data communications and an omnioptic interface for Miralukas. The Shroud contracted the components separately across the galaxy and oversaw the assembly himself. The macrobinoculars were fitted with anti-tamper explosive charges embedded into the framework to prevent reverse engineering.

Despite all the precaution, a copy of EV2 was lost when Evie Bo herself defected to the Sith Empire and informed Darth Mortis about Shroud's plan to attack Dromund Kaas. Around the same time, a copy was obtained by Republic Strategic Information Service agent Deena Riss. Since the devices provided exclusive access to the Shroud's technology, they proved invaluable in preventing his planned terrorist attacks.
EV2 discreet reconnaissance macrobinoculars appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel during the Shroud's gambit story arc.
